title: New: Bad Wave – 3 AM
content:
Having released a handful of singles over the course of the past year or so, LA duo Bad Wave (Patrick Hart and Tucker Tota) have already sculpted a rather unique sound for themselves.

Merging the pop sensibilities of the likes of Phoenix and MGMT, with more odd-pop, dare I even say psychedelic tendencies, it’s an expansive and ambitious sound, as demonstrated expertly on recent single 3AM. Colourful, glittering indie pop, it manages to sound slick without becoming too safe, yet remaining thoroughly enjoyable. Check out 3AM below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
